metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17818 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.14rc0, there is a heap-based buffer over-read that will cause a remote denial of service attack, related to a while loop in paste_tokens in asm/preproc.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17818` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.11.08-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> need to investigate which commit fixed this

criterions.comment: nasm package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.11.08-1ubuntu0.1').
